angular-audio-playlist

{{item.name}}

  Make Playlists

Inject angularPlaylistService to any controller and set a playlist or single track to a master audio player.

    
      angular.module('myApp')
        .controller('SomeCtrl', function ($scope, ngAudioPlayerService) {

          $scope.playThisList = function() {

            audioPlaylistService.setPlaylist([
              {
                order: 0,
                name: 'Prince',
                song: 'John, I\'m only dancing',
                src: 'audio/bowie.mp3',
                url: 'http://url.to/some.mp3',
              },
              {
                order: 1,
                name: 'The Gap Band',
                song: 'Winter 68',
                src: 'http://url.to/some.mp3'
              },
              {
                order: 2,
                name: 'Roy Orbison',
                song: 'Winter 68',
                src: 'http://url.to/some.mp3'
              }
            ], 2);
          };
        });

  Themeable

Customize your own template and implement only the features you care about or try one of the pre-made templates.

    
      <div>
        <div>
          <button type="button">
            <span ng-bind-html="player.buttonIcon"></span>
          </button>
        </div>
        <div>{{currentlyPlaying.name}}</div>
        <div>{{currentlyPlaying.song}}</div>
      </div>
